This 7oz spray bottle has an adjustable nozzle and translucent bottle to easily see liquid levels. It can be used for a variety of home and garden application. Looks neat but small Eyeshadow Makeup Palette Matte Shimmer Glitter Eyeshadow Pallet High Pigmented Long Lasting Professional Metallic Eye Shadows Waterproof Make-Up 35 Colors (01) SACE LADY {'Brand': 'SACE LADY', 'Item Form': 'Powder', 'Finish Type': 'Matte', 'Special Feature': 'Waterproof, Matte, Long lasting', 'Product Benefits': 'Long Lasting', 'Product Dimensions': '7.95 x 4.09 x 0.47 inches; 0.04 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'AMZ-SL326'} I love the colors! and the pigment is amazing. it is super smooth and blends really well! I was happy to see it didn't break in shipping and was packaged well. I actually really like the pallet case its simple. Nice pallets! Keratin Secrets Do It Yourself Home Keratin System Keratin Secrets {'Package Dimensions': '8.27 x 4.21 x 3.9 inches; 2.87 Pounds'} Keratin’s make the hair smoother (NOT STRAIGHT), shinier, and frizzy free for up to 8 months depending on the strength of the product. Keratin treatments rebound the keratin in your hair so that they are all put back into place. There are a lot of steps but don’t get discouraged because they’re quiet simple. To start of give 2 good shampoos with a clarifying shampoo (specifically the keratin complex one, then towel dry and blow dry the unconditioned hair. Once fully dry, make small sections and apply the treatment from roots to ends and comb through with a fine tooth comb to make sure hair is fully saturated. Let that sit for 30 minutes then blow dry again without washing out the product. Once fully dry the final step will be to straighten the hair with a flatiron so the keratin will set in your hair. After you’re completely done you won’t be able to wash your hair for up to 3 days depending on the strength in the solution. **Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Preference:** The user maintains a strong appreciation for practical home and personal care tools and has recently shown an interest in beauty products that enhance overall appearance, particularly in the area of eye cosmetics.

- **Capacity Preference:** Continues to prefer moderately sized products, ensuring that they fit functional needs without unnecessary bulk, as evidenced by recent choices.

- **Quality Awareness:** The user exhibits a discerning nature regarding product effectiveness and usability, evidenced by thoughtful evaluation and feedback. Their latest review illustrates a nuanced understanding of product performance and a critical approach to functionality.

- **Versatility:** Values multipurpose items, particularly in personal care, appreciating solutions that simplify application processes while still delivering impressive results.

- **Material Preference:** Preference remains for lightweight materials that enhance usability, consistent across both home tools and cosmetic products.

- **Review Engagement:** Actively engages in providing feedback, reflecting a thorough evaluation process that considers aesthetics, performance, and practicality. Recent interactions indicate a willingness to navigate challenges when the outcomes are worthwhile.

- **Aesthetic Sensibility:** Continues to favor vibrant and visually appealing products, demonstrating a keen eye for detail in both aesthetic appeal and performance.

In summary, the user favors functional and visually attractive items that highlight quality, usability, and versatility while maintaining an active role in product feedback and community engagement.
